channel.title: Ryuutama, The Veil: Inheritance, Once More Into the Void: Gauntlet Podcast
channel.description: On the new episode of The Gauntlet Podcast @swordqueen, @Auzumel_S, and I talk about *Ryuutama*, *The Veil: Inheritance*, and Jammi's awesome Kickstarter for *Once More Into the Void*. Thanks againto @RichRogers for the excellent edit. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/ryuutama-the-veil-inheritance-once-more-into-the-void

item.title: Ryuutama, The Veil: Inheritance, Once More Into the Void: Gauntlet Podcast
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the new episode of The Gauntlet Podcast @swordqueen, @Auzumel_S, and I talk about Ryuutama, The Veil: Inheritance, and Jammi’s awesome Kickstarter for Once More Into the Void. Thanks againto @RichRogers for the excellent edit.

THE GAUNTLET

Ryuutama, The Veil: Inheritance, Once More Into the Void

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss
